list.abs: from a pharmacologist's point of view , the most appropriate place to block the system is at rate-limiting step , which is where renin works .从药理专家的观点来看，阻断这一系统的最恰当途径是作用于限速步骤，也就是对肾素直接进行阻断。
Li Shizhen ( 1518 – 1593 ) , was one of the greatest physicians and pharmacologists .李时珍（1518–1593)，是一个伟大的医药学家。

clinical pharmacologists study how drugs work , how they interact with other drugs , how their effects can alter the disease process , and how disease can alter their effects .临床药学研究药物如何发挥作用，如何与其他药物相互作用，药物的作用如何改变疾病进程，以及疾病如何改变药物作用。

entry.def: Pharmacology is the branch of science relating to drugs and medicines.

means.word_mean: 1. someone trained in the science of drugs (their composition and uses and effects)
